description:
When cold and wet team up to try and make your ride miserable, this is the jacket you want. Building on the success of their popular Pro Barrier jacket, this insulated jacket is lined at the front with plush high-pile fleece, giving you a cozy option on grey days. Made with recycled Polartec Alpha Direct insulation, with a high-pile fleece lining that traps warm air and wicks away moisture, while the smooth outer blocks the wind and is highly breathable.

  • Polartec® Alpha Direct insulation has a smooth side with a wind blocking membrane and a warm and wicking side for you
  • High-pile fleece in the collar and front of the jacket holds in heat and pulls moisture away from your skin
  • 2-sided softshell material does away with the need for a separate lining fabric, keeping bulk to a minimum
  • PI Dry® water resistant finish shakes off light rain and road spray
  • 2-way zipper makes it easy to adjust your temperature on the go
  • 3- rear pockets for a tube, snack, sunnies and other must-haves
  • Zippered chest pocket keeps your phone close
  • Dropped hem with gripper elastic provides more coverage and stays put when you’re in the drop
  • Athletic fit hugs your body to help reduce drag. Pearl Izumi notes that jacket runs small and recommends sizing up from your normal preferred size
name: Pearl Izumi Pro Insulated Jacket - Men's
